name: Shredder Simulator Games
description:
Shred your stress away!

The Most Satisfying Game you will ever play:

- Choose Tons of items to throw in the shredder
- 100% realistic physics engine
- Throw as many items as you like
- Unlock different Shredders with higher HP

Shred things to pieces, anything from
- Phones
- Bowling balls
- Remote controls
- Consoles
- Drones
- Golf balls
- Basket Balls
- Lamps
- Glass Bottles
- Shoes
- Coconuts
- Flashlights

Finally a way to release your stress and day to day concerns by shredding objects!
